tag_list: android, xtify, lbs, mobile-marketing, location-based, emory, deloitte, webmd
overview: Josh brings over 15 years of experience developing innovative strategic business solutions for some of the largest marketing companies in the world. Josh came to Xtify directly from WebMD where he served as Senior Director of Strategic Development. Prior to WebMD, Josh was a Senior Manager at Deloitte Consulting where he led teams of consultants who addressed a variety of business challenges including product, business and customer strategy. He holds a B.B.A. from Emory University’s Goizueta Business School and Master’s degree from the Rollins School of Public Health.
